author: Jane Doe
title: The Future of Renewable Energy
content: Solar and wind power are becoming increasingly vital. Innovations in battery storage are key to overcoming intermittency issues and ensuring a stable grid.

author: John Smith
title: An Introduction to Machine Learning
content: Machine learning, a subset of AI, involves training models on data. Supervised learning uses labeled data, while unsupervised learning finds patterns in unlabeled data.

author: Jane Doe
title: Advanced Battery Technologies
content: Lithium-ion batteries dominate the market, but new research into solid-state batteries promises higher energy density and improved safety for future applications.
